subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Chase Elliott, the son of the former Nascar champion Bill Elliott, has won two races in the Nationwide Series and is in second in the points standings five months into his rookie season.
snippet: Chase Elliott, the son of the former Nascar champion Bill Elliott, has won two races in the Nationwide Series and is in second in the points standings five months into his rookie season.
